You got a problem with me?\""},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様はまっすぐ突っ切るのが好きなんだよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I like to just cut straight through.\""},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？　へ？　お前ら、なんの話してんの？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Huh? What are you guys talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アア？　気づいてねーのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? You haven't noticed?\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうはもう隠す気もねーみたいだぞ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Looks like the others don't even bother hiding anymore.\""},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"「？　ザンスちゃん、なんの話？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"? Zansu-chan, what are you talking about?\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んー？　どしたんー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What's up?\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆さん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone...\""},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"あなたが手に持つ日光が突然声を発した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The sunlight in your hand suddenly spoke."},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"「落ち着いて聞いて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please calm down and listen."},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやら、今、私達は――」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems that right now, we are――\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……囲まれています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...surrounded.\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!?\""},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どわわわあっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoaah!?\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで日光の言葉をきっかけとしたように、","translatedEnglishLine":"As if triggered by the sunlight's words,"},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"それはあなた達の周囲に湧き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"they suddenly swarmed all around you."},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵隊が、丁度グルリとあなた達を囲んでいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Soldiers had completely surrounded you."},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「森の視界が悪い中をこそこそと","translatedEnglishLine":"They must have been sneaking up through the poor visibility of the forest—"},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　迫っていたのだろうが……","translatedEnglishLine":"getting closer without being noticed..."},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"　よくもまあ、これだけの数を」","translatedEnglishLine":"But still, this many of them—impressive.\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はんっ、雑魚が何人で来ようと変わりゃしねぇよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it doesn't matter how many small fries come.\""},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐわっははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大漁大漁！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A big haul! A big haul!\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「大将！　早く言え！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Boss! Say it quickly!\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆殺しにしろとな！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kill them all!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、待って待って、元就ちゃん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-wait, wait, Motonari-chan!"},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"　殺すのはちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Killing is a bit much...\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hah...\""},{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"「笑止！！！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ridiculous!!!!\""},{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「敵は殺す！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The enemy must be killed!"},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それの何が悪い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"What's wrong with that!\""},{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But..."},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんまりそういうことして欲しくないの……","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't really want us to do that..."},{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に友達になれるかも知れない人とは」","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially with people who could possibly become friends.\""},{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それなら、どうする？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then what do you suggest? "},{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"　力ずくで止めるか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Should we stop him by force?\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クククク……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kukukuku..."},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オレはそれで構わんぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't mind that.\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、泣きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I... will cry.\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お姉ちゃんは、泣きます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Big sister will cry.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カ、カカカ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ka, kakaka...\""},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは嫌だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want that.\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リセットが泣くと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When Reset cries..."},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"　オレは、こう……","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like... this...\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「胸がざわざわする……」","translatedEnglishLine":"my chest gets restless...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンを飛び出して二週間――
あなたはいくつもの冒険を経て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have gone through many adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また自由都市に戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and returned once again to the free city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、ある森を進んでいた時のこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It happened when you were making your way through a certain forest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義が難しい顔をしていた。
「まったく、やはり森を選んだのは失敗だったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, choosing the forest was a mistake after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……アア？　そりゃテメェ、俺に文句あんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh? You got a problem with me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はまっすぐ突っ切るのが好きなんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like to just cut straight through."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　へ？　お前ら、なんの話してんの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Huh? What are you guys talking about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア？　気づいてねーのか？
向こうはもう隠す気もねーみたいだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like the others don't even bother hiding anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　ザンスちゃん、なんの話？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Zansu-chan, what are you talking about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたが手に持つ日光が突然声を発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sunlight in your hand suddenly spoke.
It seems that right now, we are――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで日光の言葉をきっかけとしたように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if triggered by the sunlight's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはあなた達の周囲に湧き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they suddenly swarmed all around you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が、丁度グルリとあなた達を囲んでいた。
「森の視界が悪い中をこそこそと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must have been sneaking up through the poor visibility of the forest—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迫っていたのだろうが……
よくもまあ、これだけの数を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, this many of them—impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ、雑魚が何人で来ようと変わりゃしねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it doesn't matter how many small fries come."
A big haul! A big haul!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待って待って、元就ちゃん！
あんまりそういうことして欲しくないの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really want us to do that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に友達になれるかも知れない人とは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially with people who could possibly become friends."
Should we stop him by force?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オレはそれで構わんぞ」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマンを飛び出して二週間――
あなたはいくつもの冒険を経て、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You have gone through many adventures,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: また自由都市に戻ってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and returned once again to the free city.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、ある森を進んでいた時のこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It happened when you were making your way through a certain forest,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱義が難しい顔をしていた。
「まったく、やはり森を選んだのは失敗だったか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Seriously, choosing the forest was a mistake after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……アア？　そりゃテメェ、俺に文句あんのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...Huh? You got a problem with me?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様はまっすぐ突っ切るのが好きなんだよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I like to just cut straight through."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へ？　へ？　お前ら、なんの話してんの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Huh? What are you guys talking about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アア？　気づいてねーのか？
向こうはもう隠す気もねーみたいだぞ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looks like the others don't even bother hiding anymore."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「？　ザンスちゃん、なんの話？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "? Zansu-chan, what are you talking about?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あなたが手に持つ日光が突然声を発した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sunlight in your hand suddenly spoke.
It seems that right now, we are――"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まるで日光の言葉をきっかけとしたように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As if triggered by the sunlight's words,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それはあなた達の周囲に湧き出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they suddenly swarmed all around you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵隊が、丁度グルリとあなた達を囲んでいた。
「森の視界が悪い中をこそこそと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must have been sneaking up through the poor visibility of the forest—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 迫っていたのだろうが……
よくもまあ、これだけの数を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But still, this many of them—impressive."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はんっ、雑魚が何人で来ようと変わりゃしねぇよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it doesn't matter how many small fries come."
A big haul! A big haul!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待って待って、元就ちゃん！
あんまりそういうことして欲しくないの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't really want us to do that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に友達になれるかも知れない人とは」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially with people who could possibly become friends."
Should we stop him by force?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オレはそれで構わんぞ」
